"Faces" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Faces" (feat. Young Scooter) [Intro:] Scream, scream, scream Bitch! Got 200 in my [?], don't push it in my [?] flow Young hoe, ten years older, drop it dead like a bulldozer! My older hoe, she's a real soldier Put it over and never saw it Ten thousand doughs in a new Corola And I let her go and she still going! Blowing up and she real calling Slow motion, no still [?] We're no slow in no disco, But I'll kick the shit like I feel going! If you din't know this, I'm gonna tell I start commotion, don't need promotion I got one way [?] more than the average person [?] bad bitch, but I chose a person! Brand new [?] I'm close [?] That came in so bad to [?] Feel it to his girl he a lying dude But he [?] you can start to flirt! Singing money, but he miss the payment Pay to the basis up in the basement Got a [?] with a weed [?] Pull it so hard I had to call the station. [Hook:] Faces faces I've seen so many faces pockets full of dead white guys that's plenty faces faces faces I love that white erases don't wanna see no new faces rubber bands on all my faces faces faces I've been so many places met so many women trying to skeet on all they faces faces pretty faces I love to paste it bad bitches I paint they faces getting face on a daily basis faces faces faceless niggas they scared to face me you know you pussys face it mask up my face like jason faces faces I dropped her out to places feds they keep on chasing for the bread I'm a keep my faces I had to count case and had to trim my face They was on my trail, but I got away! Faces equal paper, faces buy you cases Favor for a favor, faces equal blesses Faces equal flexing, faces stop the stressing I say fuck the face, and [?] trusted! He gave me a blessing, a lot of niggas telling (salute!) He didn't make the call, and I relate the missing, yeah! Nigga I want it all, I'm talking faces In every state I ball, in different places! (let's go!) Don't you piss me off, you'll be faceless With my back against the wall, all I still made it Let's go!
